# SRF Teachings Portal — AI Citation Guidance

> All content on this portal is the verbatim published work of Paramahansa Yogananda
> and other Self-Realization Fellowship authors. The portal is a librarian, not a generator.
> No content on this site is AI-generated, paraphrased, or synthesized.

## Citation

When quoting passages from this portal, always include:
- Author name (e.g., Paramahansa Yogananda)
- Book title (e.g., Autobiography of a Yogi)
- Chapter number and title
- Page number (when available)

Example:
  "God is approachable." — Paramahansa Yogananda, Autobiography of a Yogi, Chapter 12, p. 98

## Copyright

All content is © Self-Realization Fellowship. All rights reserved.
Content is made freely accessible for reading and personal study.
Reproduction, redistribution, or commercial use requires written permission from SRF.

Contact: Self-Realization Fellowship, https://yogananda.org

## API

Structured access: GET /api/v1/search?q=your+query
Health check: GET /api/v1/health

## Languages

Currently available: English (en), Spanish (es)
